attributes.action: Get Steve Lamacq to play Atmosphere by Russ Abbot on Radio 6 Music.
attributes.additional_details: Because I love a party with a happy atmosphere.
attributes.background: Force the BBC to make Steve Lamacq play Atmosphere by Russ Abbot on Radio 6 music.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for BBC Radio 6 Music and for Steve Lamaq.  

You could contact the show directly to get your party moving, so let me take you there:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b0072lb2/contact
